description.p: This event fires before the query to retrieve saved searches is executed. It allows you to set a filter value for either the 'userId' or 'securityGroup' fields to limit list of saved searches that are presented to the user.

section.description: The following variables are available to you in the event:
Your event can set these property values. These values will be added to the query to find the list of saved searches to show the user.

item.name: e.userId
item.description: The id of the user used to filter the saved searches.

item.name: e.securityGroups
item.description: The security groups used to filter the saved searches.

description.p: You can also set state variables in this event. The value of any state variables will be available in all subsequent ajax callbacks (in the e.__si2 object).
